title: Update DialogBox/Modal components
description:
Check and update modal/dialog components for UI 4 compatibility.

Components:
- DialogBox.vue (uses UModal)
- ConfirmDialog.vue
- ActionDialog.vue
- CompanySettingsDialog.vue
- TeamMembersDialog.vue

Check for:
- Slot API changes
- Prop changes
- Event handler changes

Test: All dialogs open/close correctly
acceptance_criteria: All modal/dialog components working with UI 4
